trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.RsaSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class.
Gets a value indicating whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: 이 보안 토큰 인증 자가 지정된 된 보안 토큰 유효성을 검사할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: when token is a security token; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: when token is a security token; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 보안 토큰을 인증 하 고 보안 토큰에 대 한 권한 부여 정책의 집합을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method is called on the authorization policy that is returned from this method, a claim of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Rsa%2A> is added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext> that is passed into the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>메서드는 형식의 클레임이이 메서드에서 반환 되는 권한 부여 정책에서 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Rsa%2A>에 추가 되는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A>속성은 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>전달 되는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>메서드.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Rsa%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> 형식의 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> 적용이 응용 프로그램에 대 한 권한 부여 정책의 집합이 들어 있는입니다.
